name: "Aligned" Volcanic Stone Stool
description: A low-cost, easily manufactured stone stool, requiring only some polishing of appropriately-sized stone materials. Its most distinctive feature is the notably small seat, designed to accommodate various postures that engage the core muscles. So much so that fitness enthusiasts in the Collective of Plenty have even developed a series of "Muscle Group-Targeted Sit-and-Strengthen Exercises" centered around this very stool...
